New Records: Miami Heat improved to 17-14 with the win.
New Orleans Pelicans extended their losing streak to 11 games, dropping to 5-29 on the season.
Key Match Events: Jimmy Butler was benched for the entire fourth quarter despite playing almost 25 minutes earlier in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Heat coach Erik Spoelstra mentioned Jimmy Butler's 13-day absence and the performance of the bench unit as reasons for the decision to bench him.
The game outcome contributed to Jimmy Butler's involvement in NBA trade rumors.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat's win marked a significant performance considering their sixth-place standing in the Eastern Conference.
The Pelicans' loss extended their lengthy losing streak, highlighting their struggles this season.
Others: The game was a blowout win for the Heat, showcasing their depth and resilience despite Butler's limited playing time.
